feed.title: Basic Pitches
feed.subtitle: "Basic Pitches" is an improvisional theatre company that grows & performs in Zurich, Switzerland. Despite not having a single native speaker, we proudly perform in English with a wide variety accents and oddities.

entry.title: Improv is Back
entry.content:
Let’s celebrate the return of IMPROV to jenseits IM VIADUKT with a glorious double feature of English improv and musical improv! «Don’t Touch My Mushroom» present a surprising fully improvised theatre show with scenes never seen before. Emotions, drama, fun and everything in between.

«Basic Pitches» present a musical show like no other! Basic Pitches will improvise an entire musical, complete with chart topping songs, from a few audience suggestions.

Don’t miss out on a truly imaginative, funny, touching, co-created and most of all enjoyable evening.
entry.summary: Let’s celebrate the return of IMPROV to jenseits IM VIADUKT

entry.title: Double feature - Basic Pitches: Pitch us a Musical & DTMM: Shiitake Happens

link.title: Double feature - Basic Pitches: Pitch us a Musical & DTMM: Shiitake Happens

entry.content:
Come and enjoy an evening of double the improv fun with our double feature! Two improv groups will take the stage:

  • Don’t Touch My Mushroom - Shiitake Happens: We don’t have mush room to advertise this show, but we assure you that a lot of shiitake will happen! And now that our mushroom puns ran out, the rest of the show will just be fun improv - Come and discover what fun adventures will unfold this time!

  • Basic Pitches - Pitch us a Musical: A musical show like no other! Basic Pitches will improvise an entire musical, complete with chart topping songs, from a few audience suggestions. Not to be missed!
entry.summary: Come and enjoy an evening of double the improv fun

entry.title: Open rehearsal Musical Improv
entry.content: Try out singing together with us! We will be doing some simple musical improv exercises, and you can join and sing along!

entry.title: The XxX’s + musical @ Dynamo
entry.content:
A double feature show:

  • “Don’t Touch My Mushroom” will be playing an improvised show about love and breakup called “The XxX’s”.

  • “Basic Pitches” will be playing an improvised musical.

entry.title: Open rehearsal Musical Improv
entry.content: Try out singing together with us! We will be doing some musical improv exercises and games, and you can join in if you want to.

entry.title: Musical Improv show + open jam
entry.content:
Join us for a night of musical innovation and interactive fun! The show is set to unravel in two exciting halves:

  • Musical Improv: Basic Pitches will captivate audiences with their spontaneous creation of a full musical!

  • Open Jam with Improv Games: Feeling inspired? Here’s your chance to be a part of the action! The second half of the show invites attendees to volunteer and take the stage. Dive into the world of improv games.

Come, be a spectator or be a part of the performance. Either way, it’s a night you won’t want to miss!
entry.summary: Join us for a night of musical innovation and interactive fun!

entry.title: English Open Stage & Musical
entry.content:
In the first half there is an open stage: come, watch or jump on stage with us, you decide! We play our (and your?) favourite short-form games.

In the second half, we play an improvised musical for you! An evening full of magic and fun is guaranteed! Tickets are available on eventfrog and at the box office (bring cash).”
entry.summary: In the first half there is an open stage

entry.title: Improvised Musical
entry.content:
Experience the power of music as it is created on the spot with no prior planning.

Come join us to the incredible improvised musical show by Basic Pitches! This dynamic and talented group of performers will be taking the stage at Theater Ida in Zurich, delighting audiences with their unique brand of improvisational singing. Enjoy a full evening of singing and music as you experience a full musical performance unlike anything you’ve ever seen before.
entry.summary: Experience the power of music as it is created on the spot with no prior planning.
